snippet.title: Schein - Official Gameplay Trailer (May 2014)
snippet.description:
Schein is a challenging puzzle platformer built on the myth of a wisp named Irrlicht. 
In this game light is the key to everything: Defeat deadly beasts, solve tricky puzzles and uncover hidden paths through the murky swamp. 

Development is nearing an end, Schein is complete. Catch a glimpse of its beauty in the official Schein Demo [http://scheingame.com/#download].

If you would like to see Schein on steam, give us your support on Greenlight! [http://greenlight.scheingame.com]
